item.title: Smoshの共同創設者Anthony PadillaとIan Hecoxが、18年前に立ち上げたYouTubeブランドの株式の過半数をRhett & LinkのMythicalから買い戻す（Todd Spangler/Variety)
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Smosh co-founders Anthony Padilla and Ian Hecox buy back a majority stake in the YouTube brand they launched 18 years ago, from Rhett & Link's Mythical  —  The duo have reunited as onscreen comedy partners and offscreen business associates to acquire a majority ownership stake in Smosh …

item.title: ジョージタウン・アメリカス・インスティテュート、スペイン語版ニュースポッドキャスト「Y Esto No Es Todo」を開始、スペイン語版ポッドキャスト「El Washington Post」の元ホストが参加（Hanaa' Tameez/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Hanaa' Tameez / Nieman Lab:
Georgetown Americas Institute launches Spanish-language news podcast Y Esto No Es Todo, with the former host of Spanish-language podcast El Washington Post  —  “One of our objectives is to make Georgetown more visible in Latin America...the podcast is a perfect fit to achieve that mission.”

item.title: WBDが国内ケーブルグループのレイオフを開始、DiscoveryとTurnerのアウトレットで〜100人に影響、他の部門でもこの夏さらなる削減が予想される（Cynthia Littleton/Variety）。
item.description:
Cynthia Littleton / Variety:
WBD begins layoffs in its domestic cable group, affecting ~100 people across Discovery and Turner outlets; more cuts are expected in other divisions this summer  —  Amid the shuffle, TCM general manager Pola Changnon is leaving the classic movie channel after more than 25 years with TCM and Turner.

item.title: Candle MediaがTikTokと提携、当初はリース・ウィザースプーンのHello Sunshineブランドを中心に、#BookTokから著者や文芸素材を発掘・採掘（Max Goldbart/Deadline)
item.description:
Max Goldbart / Deadline:
Candle Media partners with TikTok, initially focusing on Reese Witherspoon's Hello Sunshine brand to find and mine authors and literary material from #BookTok  —  Kevin Mayer and Tom Staggs' Candle Media has struck a partnership with TikTok, with an initial focus on Reese Witherspoon's Hello Sunshine …

item.title: iHeartMediaのTriton Digital、プログラマティック広告に特化したパリ拠点の広告情報プラットフォームManadgeを買収 (Radio World)
item.description:
Radio World:
iHeartMedia's Triton Digital acquires Paris-based ad intelligence platform Manadge, which specializes in programmatic advertising  —  Triton Digital has acquired advertising intelligence platform Manadge, a Paris-based company that specializes in programmatic advertising.

item.title: 情報筋の話：Glee』『American Horror Story』のクリエイター、ライアン・マーフィーがNetflixからディズニーに移籍する予定、マーフィーは2018年にNetflixに～300Mドルと言われている金額で入社（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Sources: Ryan Murphy, the creator of Glee and American Horror Story, plans to leave Netflix for Disney; Murphy joined Netflix in 2018 for a reported ~$300M  —  Superstar TV show creator Ryan Murphy is planning to leave Netflix Inc. for Walt Disney Co., where he would be reunited with the executives …

item.title: ソースはこちらラテン系デジタルメディア大手NGLmitúを傘下に持つ民間持株会GoDigitalが、Vice Mediaを破産から買い取るために$300M〜$350Mの入札を行う予定（Axios）。
item.description:
Axios:
Source: GoDigital, a private holding group that owns Latino digital media giant NGLmitú, plans to submit a $300M-$350M bid to buy Vice Media out of bankruptcy  —  - GoDigital's plan for Vice Media includes bringing it to profitability within 12 months, a source said.

item.title: 英国のジャーナリストの91％が大卒という調査結果を受け、FTとトータスによる非ジャーナリストの育成とニュースルームの多様化のためのプログラムを紹介（Jacob Granger/Journalism.co.jp)
item.description:
Jacob Granger / Journalism.co.uk:
A look at programs by FT and Tortoise to train non-journalists and diversify their newsrooms, as a survey shows 91% of UK journalists hold a university degree  —  With more than 90 per cent of university-educated journalists, the UK media needs to hire from beyond the pool of graduates …

item.title: 情報源: スタッフは、BBCが5人のベテラン女性プレゼンターの扱いを批判し、その多くはリストラの間、何ヶ月も仕事ができないでいる(Jake Kanter/Deadline)
item.description:
Jake Kanter / Deadline:
Sources: staff criticize the BBC for its treatment of five seasoned female presenters, many of whom have been unable to work for months during the restructuring  —  EXCLUSIVE: The BBC is facing growing pressure to find a resolution for five seasoned female presenters, many of whom have been unable …

item.title: Spotify、デスクトップアプリを更新。"Your Library "と "Now Playing "のユーザーインターフェースを一新し、同社のモバイルアプリとの整合性を図る（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）。
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Spotify updates its desktop app with redesigned “Your Library” and “Now Playing” user interfaces, meant to align the experience with the company's mobile app  —  Spotify is updating its desktop experience with redesigned “Your Library” and “Now Playing” interfaces, the company announced on Tuesday.

item.title: ストリーミング・チャートTwitchの新しいパートナー・プラス・プログラムは、70/30の収益分配を提供しますが、Twitchのパートナーには、71,000人以上の総数のうち2.5%にあたる~1,066人しか恩恵を受けません (Jody Serrano/Gizmodo)
item.description:
Jody Serrano / Gizmodo:
Streams Charts: Twitch's new Partner Plus program, which offers a 70/30 revenue split, will benefit just ~1,066 Twitch partners, or ~2.5% of the 71,000+ total  —  Only a thousand people qualify for Twitch's Partner Plus program, which will give streamers 70% of subscription revenues, according to Streams Charts.

item.title: ガネット、アドテク独占の疑いでグーグルを提訴 出版社のオンライン広告費が減少する一方でオンライン読者は増えていると主張（Lauren Feiner/CNBC）
item.description:
Lauren Feiner / CNBC:
Gannett sues Google over its alleged ad tech monopoly, claiming that online readership has grown while online ad spending has decreased for publishers  —  - USA Today publisher Gannett is suing Google for allegedly illegally monopolizing the advertising technology market.

item.title: 報告します：ドイツのBildは、数百人の解雇が予想される1億ドルのコスト削減プログラムの一環として、さまざまな編集職をAIに置き換えることを計画している（Jon Henley/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Jon Henley / The Guardian:
Report: Germany's Bild plans to replace a range of editorial jobs with AI as part of a €100M cost-cutting program expected to lead to hundreds of redundancies  —  Hundreds of redundancies expected as Axel Springer tells staff certain roles will ‘no longer exist as they do today’

item.title: NBCUniversal、デジタル広告システム「One Platform」を世界展開、ComcastのFreeWheel、Bell Media、Seven West Media、Sky Media等と提携（Patrick Frater/Variety）
item.description:
Patrick Frater / Variety:
NBCUniversal expands its One Platform digital ad system globally and partners with Comcast's FreeWheel, Bell Media, Seven West Media, Sky Media, and others  —  NBCUniversal is to expand its One Platform advertising, technology, data and measurement system further into global markets through …

item.title: ソースはこちらスポティファイ、HiFiオーディオやオーディオブックなどを備えたより高価な「スーパープレミアム」層を計画、2023年後半に米国外で開始、プレミアムは月額9.99ドル（Ashley Carman/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
Source: Spotify plans a more expensive “Supremium” tier with HiFi audio, audiobooks, and more, launching outside the US later in 2023; Premium costs $9.99/month  —  Spotify Technology SA is planning a more expensive subscription option that's expected to include high-fidelity audio …
